title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Combine spaghetti with bacon and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt for 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Prepare the sauce with tomato puree, cream, and spices.
Add chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, salt, pepper, and optional extras like egg or tomato.
ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, radishes, poached egg, chili flakes
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and mix with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread.
Add any optional toppings if desired.
